articles.description: Sachin Tendulkar reacted after his son, Arjun, emulated him by scoring a century on Ranji debut while playing for Goa.
articles.content: Days after Arjun Tendulkar scored his maiden first-class century ( 120 runs off 207 balls for Goa ), Sachin Tendulkar opened up on his son’s feat and said that being the child of a famous cricketer, … [+1549 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Messi deserves Argentina World Cup goal record - Batistuta - ESPN India
articles.description: Ex-Argentina striker Gabriel Batistuta said he was happy to see Lionel Messi overtake him as the country's top scorer at the World Cup in Qatar
articles.content: Former Argentina international Gabriel Batistuta said he was happy to see Lionel Messi overtake him as the country's top scorer at the World Cup in Qatar, where the South Americans are preparing to f… [+1344 chars]
